title: Skipper secures Rs 737 crore order from Power Grid
description: Skipper Limited secures Rs 737 crore order from PGCIL for a 765 kV transmission line. Skipper's order book exceeds Rs 3,900 crore with its Q3 consolidated net profit jumping 115% to Rs 20.4 crore. The company's revenue surged 80% to Rs 801 crore.
